Author: zack#6467
Content:
yes, reputation can help make data feeds more reliable. 
But there is the problem of retirement attacks.

And you will have a trade-off where the lower the trading fee is for a data feed, the higher the likelyhood of a retirement attack.
This makes it expensive.
